New Records: Suryakumar Yadav hit a hat-trick of swept fours against Maheesh Theekshana during the match
Key Match Events: The match was rain-delayed and started nearly an hour late due to a wet outfield
Sri Lanka collapsed in the death, losing their last nine wickets for the addition of just 31 runs
Yashasvi Jaiswal, Suryakumar Yadav, and Hardik Pandya contributed to India's win with flashy stroke play
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second T20I in the series
Sri Lanka's total of 161 for nine wickets was considered sub-par
Kusal Perera's dismissal due to a fielding error by Rinku Singh was a key moment in the match
